alert.note: Alert for Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 3:39PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Oktibbeha, Clay and northwestern Lowndes Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 339 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pala Alto, or 11 miles northwest of West Point, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Griffith around 345 PM CDT. Pala Alto around 350 PM CDT. West Point around 410 PM CDT. Muldrow around 420 PM CDT. Tibbee around 430 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
